attributes.additional_details: The UK, EU and much of NATO are currently too scared to enforce full sanctions due to over-reliance on Russian energy reserves. We are are indirectly supporting Russia’s war efforts
attributes.background: Regardless of cost, we must break away from the EU’s energy dependency on Russia. We cannot fund Russian aspirations anymore. We should accept short-term cost increases and create immediate plans for long-term energy self-sufficiency, sharing setup costs across the EU / NATO

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Place the strictest possible sanctions on Russia until it withdraws from Ukraine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609428

Full embargo of Russian imports in lieu of active military support in Ukraine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609457
